data.title: Best Buddies
data.meta_description: Best Buddies is a non-profit organization that is dedicated to enhancing the lives of people with intellectual disabilities by providing opportunities for one-to-one friendships and integrated employment.
data.text:
Best Buddies International is a nonprofit 501(c)(3) organization dedicated to establishing a global volunteer movement that creates opportunities for one-to-one friendships, integrated employment and leadership development for people with intellectual and developmental disabilities.

President: Kailynn Catalani

Vice president: Gracie Gwozdz

Treasurer: Abigail Kimber

Secretary: Emily Lang
